metaTitle: GOMERA STAR Torrevieja | Villas & Apartments from €274,900
metaDescription: Discover GOMERA STAR in Torrevieja. Luxury villas, apartments & penthouses from €274,900. GUEMAR developer. Completion June 2026. Contact us today.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to GOMERA STAR, an exclusive new development by GUEMAR in the heart of Aguas Nuevas, Torrevieja. This carefully designed project offers a selection of stunning villas, modern apartments, and sophisticated penthouses with 2-3 bedrooms, combining contemporary design with Mediterranean charm. With prices starting from €274,900, GOMERA STAR delivers exceptional value in one of Spain's most sought-after locations. The project is scheduled for completion on 01-06-2026, offering you the opportunity to own a premium property in a thriving expat community where English is widely spoken. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday home, or investment opportunity, GOMERA STAR provides the perfect blend of lifestyle, location, and investment potential. Built areas range from 77-115m², each property features modern finishes, climate control, and access to communal amenities. Discover why Torrevieja has attracted the largest expat community in Spain and become the preferred destination for property buyers seeking quality living at unbeatable prices.

locationSection.intro: Aguas Nuevas, nestled in the vibrant municipality of Torrevieja, Alicante, is one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable residential neighborhoods. This well-established area offers the perfect balance between peaceful suburban living and convenient access to world-class amenities. Torrevieja has earned its reputation as Spain's premier expat destination, with English widely spoken throughout the community. The area features excellent healthcare facilities including the prestigious Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja available 24/7, alongside numerous private English-speaking clinics. For beach lovers, Playa del Cura with its Blue Flag award is within easy reach, alongside the stunning 6km golden sands of La Mata. Shopping enthusiasts will find multiple Mercadona locations, Carrefour, and international supermarkets like Lidl and Aldi. Aguas Nuevas benefits from excellent transportation connections with regular buses serving Alicante, Murcia, and coastal towns. The neighborhood is surrounded by top-rated international schools including El Limonar International School (British curriculum) and Colegio Internacional de Torrevieja, making it ideal for families. Property values in Torrevieja have demonstrated consistent growth at +8% year-on-year, with prices 45% lower than Costa Blanca North, offering exceptional value for discerning buyers.
highlights: Airport: 30 min to Alicante International Airport (ALC)

propertyFeatures.intro: GOMERA STAR represents the pinnacle of modern construction standards and quality finishes. Each property is built to exacting specifications using premium materials and contemporary design principles. The development showcases GUEMAR's commitment to delivering homes that combine aesthetic appeal with functional excellence. From architectural detail to interior appointments, every aspect has been carefully considered to create a superior living experience. Properties feature efficient energy management systems, high-quality construction materials, and modern amenities that meet contemporary lifestyle expectations. The generous plot sizes of up to 193m² provide excellent outdoor space, while built areas ranging from 77-115m² offer flexible living configurations.
features: Double glazing with thermal break insulation
Fully equipped bathrooms with quality fixtures

content.investmentSection: GOMERA STAR presents a compelling investment opportunity in a market demonstrating strong fundamentals. Torrevieja's property market has experienced consistent appreciation of +8% year-on-year, reflecting growing demand from international buyers and strong economic fundamentals. Properties in GOMERA STAR offer attractive rental potential, with 7-night holiday lets commanding €650, positioning the development for excellent income generation. The development's location in Aguas Nuevas, combined with pricing 45% below comparable Costa Blanca North properties, creates significant value arbitrage. Torrevieja's status as Spain's largest expat community ensures robust demand from international renters and buyers seeking quality Mediterranean living. The area continues to develop with enhanced infrastructure, improved amenities, and strengthened connectivity. GUEMAR's reputation for quality construction and project delivery further enhances investment security. Whether seeking capital appreciation, rental income, or a personal residence, GOMERA STAR delivers on multiple investment criteria in one of Spain's most resilient property markets.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in GOMERA STAR?
faqs.answer: Properties in GOMERA STAR start from €274,900. The development offers a range of villas, apartments, and penthouses with 2-3 bedrooms, built sizes from 77-115m², and plot sizes up to 193m². Prices vary based on property type, size, and specification. We currently have 3 units available. Contact us directly via WhatsApp for detailed pricing on specific units that match your requirements.

faqs.question: When will GOMERA STAR be completed?
faqs.answer: GOMERA STAR is scheduled for completion on 01-06-2026. GUEMAR provides comprehensive warranty coverage protecting your investment. Each unit will be delivered according to the agreed timeline with professional project management ensuring quality and punctuality. Contact us for specific unit delivery schedules and payment plans.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of GOMERA STAR?
faqs.answer: GOMERA STAR is developed by GUEMAR, an established property developer with an excellent reputation for delivering quality homes throughout Torrevieja and the surrounding Costa Blanca region. GUEMAR maintains high construction standards and customer satisfaction, with a proven track record of on-time project completion and premium finishes.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Torrevieja is excellent for property investment and residence. The area boasts Spain's largest expat community with English widely spoken everywhere, making integration straightforward. Property values appreciate at +8% year-on-year, well above national averages. Healthcare is outstanding with Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (24-hour public facility) plus numerous private clinics. Playa del Cura's Blue Flag beach is nearby, and four championship golf courses are within 20 minutes. Prices are 45% lower than Costa Blanca North, offering superior value. Schools, shopping, and dining are all excellent quality.

faqs.question: How far is GOMERA STAR from the beach?
faqs.answer: GOMERA STAR is just 2.5km from Playa del Cura, which holds a prestigious Blue Flag award for water quality and facilities. La Mata beach with its stunning 6km stretch of golden sand is approximately 6km away. Other nearby beaches including Los Locos and Los Náufragos are equally accessible, making GOMERA STAR ideal for beach enthusiasts seeking both convenience and variety.

faqs.question: What amenities are near GOMERA STAR?
faqs.answer: GOMERA STAR is surrounded by excellent amenities. Shopping facilities include multiple Mercadona locations, Carrefour, Lidl, Aldi, and Iceland (British products). Healthcare includes Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (public, 24-hour), Quirónsalud Torrevieja (private), and multiple English-speaking clinics. Golf courses nearby include Villamartín (15 minutes), Las Ramblas (15 minutes), Campoamor (20 minutes), and La Finca (20 minutes). Schools include El Limonar International School (British) and Colegio Internacional de Torrevieja. Regular bus connections serve Alicante, Murcia, and coastal destinations.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my property in GOMERA STAR?
faqs.answer: Yes, GOMERA STAR properties offer excellent rental potential. Current market rates for 7-night holiday lets average €650, providing attractive income generation. Torrevieja's booming tourism and large expat community ensure consistent rental demand throughout the year. Many owners successfully operate their properties as holiday rentals or long-term lettings, combining personal use with income generation.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja safe for families and expats?
faqs.answer: Torrevieja is a safe, well-established community hosting Spain's largest expat population. The area has good police presence, established emergency services, and well-developed infrastructure. Excellent international schools, family-friendly beaches, and abundant recreational activities make it ideal for families. The mature expat community creates a welcoming environment with established social networks, English-language services, and familiar amenities.

content.conclusion: GOMERA STAR represents a unique opportunity to acquire premium Mediterranean property in one of Spain's most dynamic locations. With competitive pricing from €274,900, flexible property types, and strong investment fundamentals, the development appeals to owner-occupiers, holiday home seekers, and investors alike. Torrevieja's position as Spain's leading expat destination, combined with consistent 8% annual property appreciation and excellent rental income potential, creates multiple pathways to value creation. GUEMAR's proven development expertise ensures quality construction and reliable delivery by 01-06-2026. Whether you're seeking a permanent home base with immediate beach and golf access, a holiday residence generating rental income, or a strategic property investment, GOMERA STAR delivers on all fronts. The combination of location, lifestyle, and value is difficult to replicate elsewhere on the Costa Blanca. Secure your future in the Mediterranean sun. Contact us today via WhatsApp for exclusive availability, detailed floor plans, and personalized investment analysis. Our team speaks English and is ready to guide you through the entire purchase process.
